title: Mobile money transaction receipts (M-Pesa, GCash, bKash)
dataVerified: Sender, recipient, phone numbers, amount, transaction ID, agent location
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Transaction status (completed). Link to mobile money operator system (parties and regulators, requires authentication)
rationale: Developing markets rely on printed mobile money receipts. Domain binding verifies mobile money operator. Tamper-evident transaction proof. Tax compliance. Prevents duplicate payment claims. Agent fraud prevention. Critical for unbanked populations.
